---
title: B2AI Challenge Portal
subtitle: B2AI Azure Data Enclave
---

The B2AI Challenge Portal currently offers a small collection of tools and services.

- Check **[Ares](/ares/)** to characterize data and assess data quality for the OMOP data.
- Use **[Atlas](/atlas/)** to conduct scientific analyses, create cohorts, and generate models against OMOP data.
- Open the challenge's **[ML Workspace](/lab/)** to write code in Python and R, and train models against the dataset.
